segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's talk about any dependents you might have. Can you start by sharing the name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Sure! It's uh, Emily. I call her Em. She’s my daughter.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And when was she born? I need the date of birth if you have that handy.
segments.client_message: Yeah, she was born on, um, the fifteenth of June, nineteen ninety-eight.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect! Just one last thing—until when is she considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Uh, I think she’ll be a dependent until she turns twenty-five. So, that would be, uh, June fifteenth, twenty-twenty-three.
